full_summary:
=====================================


## Tender Notice
================

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the provision of software solutions as outlined in this tender notice.

**Document Reference**
-----------------

Document number: W8486-249604/A | Notice number: CB-399-30738716 | Amendment number: 5

**Solicitation Information**
--------------------

* Invitation number: W8486-249604/A
* Invitation type: Competitive bidding - Open invitation to tender
* Closing date: 2024-05-15 14:00:00 | Amendment date: 2024-05-15
* Expected contract start date: 2024-05-31 | Expected contract end date: 2027-03-31

**Description of Solicitation**
-----------------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide [insert description of software solution]. This is a [insert expected outcome, e.g., technical solution, consulting service] to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Bidding Instructions**
----------------------

Bidders must submit their bids electronically via e-mail to the address below. Please review the solicitation documents for more information on electronic submission requirements.

* Inbox: `dlcspm_licenses@forces.gc.ca`
* Email address for submission requirements: `keti.gjomarkaj@forces.gc.ca`

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information, please contact the contracting agency as follows:

* Department: Department of National Defence
* Contact person: Keti Gjomarkaj
* Contact phone: Not provided
* Email address: (`keti.gjomarkaj@forces.gc.ca`)


**Attachments**
-------------

Please download and review the attached solicitation documents and reference materials provided below.

- [Tender Description - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34314/w8486-249604---dtsearch---canadabuys-amendment---3.pdf)
- [Solicitation Documents - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34314/w8486-249604---dtsearch---rfp%28en.pdf)
- [Tender Description - French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34314/w8486-249604---dtsearch---rfp%28fr.pdf)
- [Attachments - See original solicitation notice for documents](
